com.alee.utils
Class GeometryUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.alee.utils.GeometryUtils

public class GeometryUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a set of utilities to work with points and various shapes.

Since:
1.4
Author:
Mikle Garin
